alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Poweshiek and southeastern Jasper Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rock Creek Lake, or 7 miles southwest of Grinnell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grinnell around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Montezuma. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 166 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
